ee.guardtime.proov.tlv

Class TLVService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ee.guardtime.proov.tlv.TLVService

  • public class TLVService
extends java.lang.Object
    TLVService class is used for managing all operations with manifest files. Reading existing manifests and writing new ones.
